text: Jiaru nimen zai luxing zhong [jiedai], er nimen you zhao bu dao daibi ren, name, keyong diya pin zuo diya. Jiaru nimen zhong de yiren xintuo ling yiren, name,[xintuo ren suoqu xintuo wu shi], shoutuo ren dang jiao chu shoutuo wu, dang jingwei ta de zhu an la. Nimen buke yincang zhengju. Shei yincang zhengju, shei de xin que shi youzui de. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quanzhi de.
